p: The alignment of RdRp sequences from HCV and the three epidemic/pandemic coronaviruses, confirms the high homology and conservation in several residues along the sequence and in particular in the Motif B and C. On the contrary, such homology is almost lost when RdRp sequences from the three epidemic/pandemic coronaviruses are aligned with those from negative-sense RNA viruses, namely Ebola, Influenza, Rabies and Vesicular Stomatitis viruses [ 16].
